oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ||horu resembles the kochelman, or !khau. Children eat them, but not grown-up people. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-32.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Note on lizards
